attributes.action: Send his own children to Iraq, if its such a good cause to fight and die for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every time a solider dies, Tony Blair says "he did for a good cause."
He should enlist his own children in the Forces and send them to make him proud - as an example to the rest of us of how much be believes his own rhetoric.

rejection.details: We do not host petitions which relate to the Prime Minister's family.
reasons: The names of family members of elected representatives or officials of public bodies
